menu.name: irish-food-beef-stew
menu.description: A delicious starter to ignite your taste buds.

menu.name: Main Course
menu.description: Exquisite main course options that will satisfy your cravings.

menu.name: Dessert
menu.description: Indulge in our sweet and delightful desserts.

menu.name: irish-food-soda-bread
menu.description: A mainstay on the Irish dinner table, best served straight out of the oven or day-old toasted with butter.

menu.name: Shepherd’s Pie
menu.description: Made with a layer of ground beef or lamb with vegetables and topped with creamy whipped mashed potatoes, then baked and browned to perfection.

menu.name: Colcannon and Champ
menu.description: Potatoes once again take center stage, this time in their creamy mashed rendition alongside cabbage and spring onions.

menu.name: Boxty
menu.description: Served for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or anything in between; there’s never a wrong time of day to enjoy this Irish potato pancake!

menu.name: Bambrack
menu.description: Made with juicy raisins or dried fruits, this sweet loaf is made even more delicious when it’s soaked in tea and whiskey. Enjoy a thick slice of this fortunetelling fruitcake with an afternoon tea.

menu.name: Boiled Bacon and Cabbage
menu.description: Finished off with a delicate and creamy parsley sauce, it’s an unexpectedly delicious and traditionally Irish meal.
